summary: Robert Frederick Xenon "Bob" Geldof, KBE   is an Irish singer, songwriter, and political activist.
full_text: The Boomtown Rats are an Irish new wave band that had a series of Irish and UK hits between 1977 and 1985. The group is led by vocalist Bob Geldof. The other members of the original line-up were Garry Roberts , Johnnie Fingers , Pete Briquette , Gerry Cott  and Simon Crowe . The Boomtown Rats broke up in 1986, but reformed in 2013, without Johnnie Fingers or Gerry Cott.
title: The Boomtown Rats
